alert.note: Alert for Clay; Crawford; Effingham; Jasper; Lawrence; Richland (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 01 at 4:38PM CDT until August 01 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN LAWRENCE...SOUTHWESTERN CRAWFORD...SOUTHERN JASPER... NORTHERN RICHLAND...NORTHEASTERN CLAY AND SOUTHEASTERN EFFINGHAM COUNTIES... At 438 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Ste. Marie to near Newton to near Bogota, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Oblong, Ste. Marie, Willow Hill, Hardinville, Chauncey, West Liberty, Dundas, Olney, Lawrenceville and Birds. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Crawford; Effingham; Jasper; Lawrence; Richland
